The global climatology of the daily SIP (Fig. 7) was calculated with the TUV model and satellite-based observations (1990–2000) of total ozone and clouds, as previously described by Lee-Taylor et al.
69 but modified to use the Setlow DNA action spectrum normalized at 254 nm. The TUV model version 5.3 used in this study is available openly and freely at: https://www2.acom.ucar.edu/modeling/tropospheric-ultraviolet-and-visible-tuv-radiation-model.
